summary: The F-35 fighter plays a key role in U.S. defense strategy. As of October, the United States and international partners had fielded more than 435 of an expected 3,300 aircraft. We testified that DOD faces challenges keeping the growing fleet ready to perform its mission, largely due to insufficient planning. Challenges include Spare parts shortages: F-35s were unable to fly about 30% of the time...
title: F-35 Aircraft Sustainment: DOD Faces Challenges in Sustaining a Growing Fleet
